{{cpp/title|cv_status}}
{{cpp/thread/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=condition_variable|since=c++11|1=
enum class cv_status {
    no_timeout,
    timeout   
};
}}

The scoped enumeration {{tt|std::cv_status}} describes whether a timed wait returned because of timeout or not.

{{tt|std::cv_status}} is used by the {{tt|wait_for}} and {{tt|wait_until}} member functions of {{lc|std::condition_variable}} and {{lc|std::condition_variable_any}}.

===Member constants===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Name|Explanation}}
{{dsc|{{tt|no_timeout}}|the condition variable was awakened with {{tt|notify_all}}, {{tt|notify_one}}, or spuriously}}
{{dsc|{{tt|timeout}}|the condition variable was awakened by timeout expiration}}
{{dsc end}}
